name: Bertie
message:
Hello,

 

I hope you are well.

Please can you let me know the availability and offering price for the purchase of LOBE PUMPS, and DOUBLE SEAT MIXPROOF VALVE as per our profile plan and technical Specifications?  

Also, kindly provide us with your company catalog or brochure so we can review and provide you with our Technical Specifications/profile plan and other detailed requirements for your review and quoting reference, and we will also need this for our future purchasing references.

Please let me know if you would be able to assist and if you are not the persons in charge, kindly provide me with the contact details and email address of the right person, so that we can follow up immediately for the purchase of this LOBE PUMPS, and DOUBLE SEAT MIXPROOF VALVE

Your prompt action and response in this regard would be highly appreciated.



Best Regards



Name: Bertie Moore 
INTERNATIONAL PURCHASING MANAGER
Address: 57 Rue Van Eyck 1000 Brussels.
Tel. +32 0991 604801. Fax +32 0991 604289
Email: bertie.moore@zohomail.eu

name: Marcel
message:
Hi, i am Marcel Stanislav sales Assistant from Aliance Group Sweden.

Please kindly advise if your company can export to Sweden?

We have active projects that requires most products and services as seen
on your website.

If yes kindly keep us informed upon your feedback so we can send our
preferred listing for quote.
 
For further information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to
write us.

name: Rob
message:
Hello, Please confirm if you ship to California, USA

Kindly have a sales representative email me to discuss our products of interest further 

I remain at your disposal
